# Translations {.unnumbered}

The list of translations by langID 

```{r, echo=FALSE}
main_db <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "../data/tables/main.sqlite")
quary <- paste("SELECT", "*", "FROM", "translations", "ORDER BY langID")
translations_table <- DBI::dbGetQuery(main_db, quary)

output_string <- ""

for (row_index in 1:nrow(translations_table)) {
  working_row <- translations_table[row_index,]
  
  lang_ID <- working_row$langID
  part_label <- working_row$partLabel
  part_ID <- working_row$partID
  part_desc <- working_row$partDesc
  part_instr <- working_row$partDesc
  if(length(part_instr) < 1 || is.na(part_instr) || part_instr=="NA"){
    part_instr = "Part Instruction is missing at this moment"
  }
  
  # Not using switch case since more then one if could be true
  # Adding these here as 0 length characters set full glue value to 0 characters
  if(length(lang_ID) < 1){
    lang_ID <- "Language ID is missing at this moment"
  }
  if(length(part_label) < 1){
    part_label <- "Part Label is missing at this moment"
  }
  if(length(part_ID) < 1){
    part_ID <- "Part ID is missing at this moment"
  }
  if(length(part_desc) < 1){
    part_desc <- "Part Description is missing at this moment"
  }
  
  output_string <- glue::glue('{output_string}
                              
                              {lang_ID}
                              {part_label}({part_ID}):
                              {part_desc}
                              {part_instr}')
}

```

`r output_string`
